contents.text: Thank you for calling Traction, the San Francisco interactive agency that merges psychology and technology to transform human behavior into consumer action.
For new business inquiries and proposals, press 1.
To discuss digital and interactive marketing campaigns, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our interactive campaign specialists.

navigationGoals: Request a proposal for launching a new interactive marketing initiative
I need to discuss a proposal for a digital marketing campaign for my veteran-owned outdoor gear startup.
I want a detailed proposal for a new integrated digital marketing campaign with UX/UI focus and KPI projections.
I’d like to speak with someone about setting up a new digital and interactive marketing campaign.
I need to pitch an interactive marketing proposal for my university physics outreach group

contents.text: To explore our behavioral psychology solutions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our psychology and technology experts.

navigationGoals: Inquire about behavioral psychology solutions to boost user engagement
I want to learn about behavioral psychology strategies for my PTSD awareness campaign.
I’d like to discuss leveraging behavioral psychology frameworks for our user engagement solution.
I need information on your behavioral psychology services to boost my customer engagement.
I want to explore behavioral psychology tools to boost engagement in my online physics tutorial platform

contents.text: For existing client support and project updates, press 2.
For technical support or troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue in my current campaign setup
I’m locked out of the client portal for my veteran mental health campaign and need technical help.
I need assistance debugging the API integration in my current campaign toolkit.
I’m an existing client having technical issues with my account portal and need help troubleshooting.
I’m having trouble accessing the technical data feed in my current campaign and need support

contents.text: For project status, reporting, and analytics, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our project management team.

navigationGoals: Get the latest project status and performance analytics report
I’d like an update on my project’s performance analytics for my veteran outreach initiative.
I want to retrieve the latest analytics dashboard and status update for my ongoing project.
I need an update on my current project’s status and performance reports.
I’d like to get the latest status update and performance analytics on my ongoing marketing campaign
